Guangzhou INEO Kitchen Equipment Co., Ltd.
B316, Bldg No.1,No.329Yushan W.road,MOCA Creative Industry Park, Panyu Guangzhou,China 511400 86-15018748580 86-20-39292071 86-20-39292498 admin@cnineo.com http://www.cnineo.com
This supplier has been audited by the b2b tradett.com >Add to Company Favorites Products Kitchen Equipment Total 80 Product(s) We are professional kitchen equipment factory and supplier in China.We can produce kitchen equipment according to your requirements.More types of kitchen equipment wanted,please contact us right now! View:
Auto-lift Electric Fryer EF-6S . EF-8S Auto-lift Electric Fryer with time setting design for lifting so it no need caretaker,auto control of oil temperature to make sure the food can be cooked evenly. As a commercial kitchen equipment,it enjoy lots of appreciation worldwide.
Electric 1 Tank 1 Basket Fryer EF-81 As a commercial kitchen, Electric Fryer is widely used in Fast Food Restaurant and other kinds of commercial hotel. Basically, it is using for making delicious fast food such as French Fries , Chicken Wings,Chicken Nuggets etc. Meeting internation hygiene and safety standard so it received CE certificate.
Fast Food Electric Fryer EF-4L,EF-6L,EF-8L,EF Electric Fryer is general using on Fast Food Restaurant it is very easy to control. It has received CE Approval and multiple capacity eletric fryer for you to choose.
Electric 2 Tanks 2 Baskets Fryer EF-4L-2,EF-6L-2,EF-8 Electric Fryer is general using on Fast Food Restaurant and it is very easy to control. There are 4 sizes for you to choose and it must be easy fyou to the suitable kitchen equipment among these multiple capacity styles.
Freestanding Electric 2 Tanks 2 Baskets Fryer EF-85 Freestanding Electric Fryer is made of 304 stainless steel and it is equipped with degreases devices. It is widely used in Fast food restaurant and snack kitchen.
Electric Donut Fryer EF-T Electric Donut Fryer is made of 304 stainless steel with CE approval. It is widely used on fast food restaurant and snack kitchen.
Oil Filter Cart LG-20 Oil Filter Cart is using widely on Commerical Kitchen for oil filtering to ensure the cooking oil is healthy and clean.It is equipped with switch protection cover for your security. Wheel device is more convenient for you to move .
Knee Operated Hand Washing Sink INS-01 The body of this washing sink is 201 stainless steel and the bowl is made of 304 stainless steel. And this washing sink has knee operated design so it will be more convenient to control.
Kitchen Worktable IN-11 Work Bench With Splashback is made of high quality stainless steel which is very endurable.Quite suitable for using in kitchen preparation area.
Mobile Work Bench With 2 Under Shelves IN-14 Our clients can avail from us an exquisite range of Mobile Work Bench With 2 Under Shelves overhead Shelves at highly competitive prices. We make sure to check our products, to ensure the delivery of quality assured range of products to our customers.
Mobile Work Bench With Under Shelf IN-15 We are offering best available quality of Mobile Work Bench With Under Shelfs. These products are developed from effective technology and the top is constructed out of heavy gauge stainless steel with optional splash guard with or without under shelves and optional drawers.
Work Bench Under Shelf IN-17 Work Bench With Under Shelf is made of high quality stainless steel and it is very endurable and very easy to clean. Quite suitable for commercial kitchen use.
Griddle With Cabinet ZH-RG,ZH-TG,JZH-RG The upper cooking surface of Griddle With Cabinet is equipped with chromium coating to prevent food getting scorched and the thickness of the stainless steel panel is 20mm . The cabinet below the griddle allow you to have storage.
Single Sink Bench IN32 We offer Single Sink Bench that are an essential part of every modern and commercial kitchen. It has a stainless steel construction, which ensures its durability and corrosion resistance. The commercial kitchen sink has a chair-type design, which means that users can easily wash various kitchen utensils while standing.
Tiple Sink Bench IN34 These Tiple Sink Bench are manufactured using high class stainless steel to make sure long life operations and flawless performance. Our products are highly appreciated for its design, which provide versatile applications and take less space.
Sliding Doors Bench Cabinet DM73 Ineo Kitchen Equipment company can provide you with many kind of kitchen storage equipment. This bench cabinet is made of 304 # stainless steel which is very durable and easy to clean. To supply a better placement for the dish,plate and other kitchenware. so storage cabinet is quite necessary for the commercial kitchen.
Kitchen Storage Cabinet DM76 Ineo Kitchen Equipment company is the professional supplier who can provide you with high quality kitchen storage equipment. This model is equipped with 3 drawers which allow you to put the different kitchenware inside.Cabinet with sliding door design is very convenient to use.Top area can be used as worktable.
Splash Back Worktable Cabinet DM97 All the kitchen storage equipment from Ineo Kitchen Equipment company are made of 304# stainless steel which is very endurable and easy to clean. This model is equipped with sliding door for the big cabinet and 4 drawers in side. It is widely used in commercial restaurnt kitchen.
Commercial Kitchen Storage Cabinet DM77 Ineo Kitchen Equipment company aims to supply the functional and endurable kitchen storage equipment to all the customers. This model is equipped with 3 upper shelves which enlarge the using space to satisfy different client's requirement.And the top area of the drawers can be used as worktable.
Compartment Plastic Rack JW-1 INEO Kitchen Equipment company can provide you with many kind of taps for kitchen sinks. A variety of design and construction can satisfy your different requirement.
